SEARCH
Package edu.core.users

Class Guest

java.lang.Object
edu.core.users.User
edu.core.users.Guest
public class Guest extends User
Representation of a guest user in the cruise reservation system. This class provides specific functionalities and attributes related to a guest user.
See Also:

    • Guest

      public Guest(String username, String password, String firstName, String lastName, int rewardPoints, String email)
      Constructor for creating a new Guest.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the guest.
      password - The password of the guest.
      firstName - The first name of the guest.
      lastName - The last name of the guest.
      rewardPoints - Initial reward points of the guest.
      email - The email of the guest.
